availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John L. Faver (Hopkins Co., KY, farmer)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Logan County, Kentucky, native. Married to Mary E. Beeson Faver in Hopkins County on July 8, 1856. Father of Lewis T. Faver and Mary B. Faver. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 772.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, District 6, p. 289A.
